duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the analysis, costing, and development of offers for Public Sector customers.
Create internal pricing models for renewal and acquisition market opportunities.
Collaborate with Product, Network, Finance, Legal, and other key stakeholder groups to enable winning solutions for customers.
Work independently with little supervision to meet RFP deadlines both internally and externally.
Provide constructive feedback to peer analysts in reviews on pricing before large submissions.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree (Finance, Business, Economics, and/or Accounting preferred)
